tooltip.btn.zoom: Use the mouse wheel to scale the model
tooltip.btn.ammo_select: Select ammunition type for priority use
tooltip.btn.apply: Apply modifications, modifications cannot be undone, please consider carefully!
tooltip.btn.modify_prevented: The modification has been applied or there is not enough space left
tooltip.btn.long_press_to_accept: Long press to accept the recycle agreement
tooltip.action_res.prevented_by_child: Cannot operate, there are sub-attachments dependent on this
tooltip.bullet_crafting.detail: Click to select the bullet to be manufactured
tooltip.action_res.require_attach: Requires '$name' or its equivalent to be installed first
tooltip.item.useless: It's no use. Why don't you throw it away
tooltip.item.unknown_attachment_1: The attachment for this id: $id could not be recognized
tooltip.item.unknown_attachment_2: This attachment may exists in an addon, or may have existed in the past
tooltip.item.unknown_attachment_3: Don't throw this away! Whenever you pick up this item, the system will try to check the attachment corresponding to the id: $id and redeem it for you automatically
tooltip.gcaa.turn_flashlight: Press $key turn on / off flashlight or lighting mode
tooltip.gcaa.manage_ammunition: Right-click to merge this type of loose ammo
tooltip.screen_info.need_terminal: Please use the trading terminal to open
label.attachments_screen.wait_response: Wait for a response from the server (press ESC if there is no response for a long time)
label.client_settings.title: Client side settings
key.gcaa.open_debug_gun_screen: Show gun debug screen (only debug mode)
key.gcaa.turn_flashlight: Turn ON / OFF flashlight or switch lighting mode
tooltip.gcaa.modify_magnification: Use the mouse wheel to adjust magnification while aiming
gcaa.ammunition_mod.incendiary_special: Grant extra $rate of fire damage, ignite target, ignite TNT
gcaa.ammunition_mod.explosive_special: Give an additional $rate of explosive damage, ignite TNT
gcaa.ammunition_mod.heal_special: Unconditionally grants bullet damage $rate health recovery, grants $time seconds $effect
gcaa.ammunition_mod.efficient_propellant: Increases all attributes by 2.5%. No smoke is produced during first-person shooting
item.gcaa.g19.introduction: A compact and lightweight handgun with exceptional reliability, perfect for defense in both urgent and non-urgent or half-urgent situations
item.gcaa.python_357.introduction: A classic revolver offering precision and high stopping power. A cost-effective secondary weapon choice—trust me on this.
item.gcaa.vector_45.introduction: An ultra-high fire rate SMG with lightning-fast close-range kill efficiency and super-low ammo capacity to save bullets. All pros, no cons!
item.gcaa.akm.introduction: A classic and robust assault rifle renowned for its high power and reliability. What? You want an original Soviet-made one? $500 more!
item.gcaa.m4a1.introduction: A mainstream high-rate-of-fire assault rifle with strong firepower and stability. The perfect choice for fast-paced battles—everyone should own at least one!
item.gcaa.awp.introduction: A legendary sniper rifle, imported straight from CSGO. With its high penetration and one-shot lethality, it dominates long-range engagements with ease.
item.gcaa.m870.introduction: A reliable pump-action shotgun that allows firing while reloading. Perfect for both offense and defense—and a great arm workout too!
item.gcaa.m249.introduction: There are two ways to survive safely in Minecraft: 1. Switch to Peaceful mode. 2. Buy an M249!
item.gcaa.xm1014.introduction: A semi-automatic shotgun with rapid-fire capability, allowing firing while reloading. The ultimate weapon for clearing close-range threats.
item.gcaa.mk47.introduction: A highly modular rifle compatible with a variety of attachments. Experience the best of both AK and AR worlds—a tactical must-have.
item.gcaa.ak12.introduction: A sleek and modern modular assault rifle equipped with a muzzle brake and tactical stock. Are you sure you don’t want to buy one?
item.gcaa.beretta_686.introduction: An elegant and practical double-barrel shotgun. Its volley-fire mode delivers devastating damage—if it doesn’t finish the job, well...
item.gcaa.hk_g28.introduction: A highly modular designated marksman rifle with powerful precision, covering medium to long-range targets with exceptional adaptability.
item.gcaa.mp5.introduction: A highly classic submachine gun with reliable performance, ideal for quick assaults and defense.
item.gcaa.fn_ballista.introduction: A sniper rifle chambered in .338 ammo, offering immense power with each shot capable of taking down an enemy, but with a relatively slow rate of fire.
item.gcaa.m60e4.introduction: A powerful general-purpose machine gun, combining firepower and durability, ideal for sustained enemy suppression.
item.gcaa.fn57.introduction: A compact and precise handgun chambered in 5.7mm, offering high penetration. A top-tier sidearm choice worth having.
